definition: to go forward/to advance/to go in/to enter/to put in/to submit/to take in/to admit/(math.) base of a number system/classifier for sections in a building or residential compound
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
commerce/merchant/dealer/to consult/2nd note in pentatonic scale/quotient (as in 智商[zhi4 shang1], intelligence quotient)

sentences.english: This enables consolidated customs clearance using a single importer of record.
sentences.chinese: 這就可以使用一個進口商記錄進行集中式海關清關。

sentences.english: Mr. Black is talking with the Chinese importer about inspecting the goods。
sentences.chinese: 布萊克先生與中方進口商就商品檢驗問題進行洽談。

sentences.english: Rate paying is needed for importing merchandize.
Mr. Black is talking with the Chinese importer about inspecting the goods.
sentences.chinese: 布萊克西席與中方進口商就商品檢驗題目舉行卡脖子。

sentences.english: A: I understand you are selling the same products to some other Australian importers.
sentences.chinese: 我知道你們也向其他澳大利亞進口商出售同樣的產品。

sentences.english: The importers have the right to re-inspect the goods after their arrival.
sentences.chinese: 進口商在貨到後有權對貨物進行復驗。

sentences.english: Small traders can't compete in the face of cheap imports.
sentences.chinese: 面對廉價的進口商品，小商人無法與之競爭。

sentences.english: American households also benefit from the freedom to choose imports from around the world.
sentences.chinese: 美國家庭也從自由選擇全球進口商品中得到實惠。

sentences.english: On the contrary, some medium and small-scale importers may be apter to keep in touch and is close.
sentences.chinese: 相反，一些中小型的進口商可能更容易接觸和接近。
葉十大進口商和出口商。

sentences.english: The importers have the right to reinspect the goods after their arrival.
sentences.chinese: 進口商在貨到後有權複驗商品。

sentences.english: Yet the desire for imported goods continually trumps the risk.
sentences.chinese: 但對於進口商品的需求不斷地壓過風險。

sentences.english: We take this opportunity to introduce ourselves as large importers of fertilizers in our country.
sentences.chinese: 乘此機會，茲介紹，我公司爲國內化肥大進口商。

sentences.english: Meat & Poultry. It is an importer. ;
sentences.chinese: 畜禽肉產品，該公司是一個進口商。

sentences.english: Importers are also requested to keep records on import and sales details.
sentences.chinese: 進口商也要求保持記錄進口和銷售的詳細資料。

sentences.english: As you know, we're a large knitwear importer.
sentences.chinese: 你也知道，我們是一家大的針織品進口商。

definition: to oversee/to take charge of/to supervise/to administer/supervisory/supervision
